sentences.english: Visit a local music store and sample each other's favorite artists.
sentences.chinese: 参观当地的音像店，选录对方喜欢的歌手音乐。

sentences.english: He extracted several paragraphs from the newspaper article to read at the meeting.
sentences.chinese: 他选录了报上文章中几段，在会议上念。

sentences.english: Typical Use:He extracted several paragraphs from the newspaper article to read at the meeting.
sentences.chinese: 他选录了报上文章中的几段，在会议中念。

sentences.english: The document he chose and compiled is very valuable. It should be recommended to everyone.
sentences.chinese: 他选录的文件很有价值，应该推荐给大家看看。

sentences.english: Tao Yuanming is the poet whose poems are selected most by Gushigui and valuated very highly.
sentences.chinese: 《古诗归》选录陶渊明诗作数量最多，且评价极高。

sentences.english: The record company selects and records some of his songs from different periods.
sentences.chinese: 唱片公司选录了他不同时期的歌曲。

definition: Collection of Yuefu Songs and Ballads, compiled in the 11th century by Guo Maoqian 郭茂倩[Guo1 Mao4 qian4]

notes on poetry, an essay genre consisting of informal commentary on poems and poets and their lives (old)/a genre of narrative literature interspersing prose with poetry, popular in the Tang and Song dynasties
to include (in a collection)/to put together (stories, poems etc)/to record/to employ/to recruit
Guo Maoqian (11th century), Song dynasty editor of the Collection of Yuefu Songs and Ballads 樂府詩集|乐府诗集[Yue4 fu3 Shi1 ji2]
form of writing novels that comprise lots of poetry in the body of the text, popular in the Ming Dynasty
assumed name of Sun Zhu 孫誅|孙诛[Sun1 Zhu1] (1711-1778), poet and compiler of Three Hundred Tang Poems 唐詩三百首|唐诗三百首[Tang2 shi1 San1 bai3 Shou3]
gratitude for good treatment/to sigh/to lament
